item.description:
What’s better than watching baseball with fellow Midwesterners?

How about watching three games at once - and all Midwest teams!

That’s right! You can!

Friday, Sept. 5, our Meetup group is taking over the Sports Depot in Allston and renting out a private room to watch the following games on three different TVs:

Chicago Cubs VS Cincinnati Reds (7:10 pm game time)
Cleveland Indians VS Kansas City Royals (8:10 pm game time)
Detroit Tigers VS Minnesota Twins (8:10 pm game time)

Join us for pitchers of beer, great food, and a fun time while cheering on your favorite team. Show some hometown pride and wear your team’s colors.

Details

Who: The Boston Ex-Midwesterners Meetup Group
What: Batter up! Midwest Baseball Frenzy
Date: Friday, Sep 5
Time: 6:00 pm (or whatever time you show up)
Location: SPORTS DEPOT, 353 Cambridge Street, Allston, MA 02134 http://www.sportsdepo...

About Sports Depot
The Sports Depot was voted by Men's Health Magazine ‘Boston's Best Sports Bar’, Boston Magazine ‘Best of Boston’, Boston Globe ‘Best of Boston’, and Phantom Gourmet ‘Best Sports Bar’.

The Depot is the BEST place in Boston to watch the games. It is accessible to Storrow Drive and the Mass Pike (Cambridge/Brighton Exit -- left exit when traveling east), as well as to the B arm of the green line (10 min. walk from the Harvard Ave stop). Lots of TVs, good food, and in a great historic building to boot!

Free parking at Sports Depot’s parking lot.

Driving Directions
Take the Mass Pike (east or west) to the Allston/Brighton Exit. Follow signs for Allston, which puts you directly on Cambridge Street. At the fourth set of lights take a right and you will be at the entrance to the parking lot.
